comments.verification: COALESCE semantics now clearly documented with inline comment explaining immutability and run isolation
Backward compatibility strategy clearly explained with comment about NULL fallback
Migration documentation is exemplary: clear header explaining purpose, backfill strategy, and SQL-level COMMENT documenting column semantics

comments.comment: Migration documentation (lines 1-11) sets excellent precedent for future maintainers. The backfill strategy explanation makes the dual-path query logic immediately understandable.
